armorMods.name: Vitality
armorMods.description: Increases Max HP by [60~300]

armorMods.name: Armor
armorMods.description: Increases Armor by [4.8~24]

armorMods.name: Magic Armor
armorMods.description: Increases Magic Resistance by [4.8~24]

armorMods.name: Psyche
armorMods.description: Increases Max MP by [4~20]

armorMods.name: Punish
armorMods.description: When taking direct damage from Basic Attacks, has a (melee weapons [10%~20%] / ranged weapons [20%~40%]) chance to increase the attacker's Attack Speed by [-8%~-40%] for 6s. Trigger Interval: 30s

armorMods.name: Physical Resistance
armorMods.description: When taking direct Physical Damage, has a [17%~35%] chance to increase Armor by [8%~40%] for 4s. Trigger Interval: 30s

armorMods.name: Valor Force
armorMods.description: When affected by hard control effects (Stun, Fear, Frozen, Knockup, Petrify), has a [17%~35%] chance to increase Crowd Control Resistance by [5~25] for 6s. Cooldown: 30s

armorMods.name: Rebound
armorMods.description: Taking direct damage from Basic Attacks has a chance ([15%~30%] for ranged weapons / [10%~20%] for melee weapons) to grant a buff for 5s: Taking direct damage from Basic Attacks has a chance ([15%~30%] for ranged weapons / [10%~20%] for melee weapons) to deal [40%~200%] Physical Damage to the attacker. Trigger Interval: 25s

armorMods.name: Frenzy
armorMods.description: When taking Direct Damage from Basic Attacks, has a [8%~40%] chance to increase Attack Speed by [6%~40%] for 5s. Enters 30s cooldown after triggering.

armorMods.name: Emulation
armorMods.description: When hit by a critical hit, has [8%~40%] chance to increase Basic Attack's Critical Chance by [3%~15%] for 5s. Trigger Interval: 30s

armorMods.name: Magic Resistance
armorMods.description: When hit by Magic Damage, has a [17%~35%] chance to increase Magic Resistance by [8%~40%] for 4s. Trigger Interval: 30s

armorMods.name: Barrier
armorMods.description: When taking direct damage from skills, has a [17%~35%] chance to gain [Target-based Max HP [3%~15%]] Shield Points for 4s. Trigger Interval: 30s

armorMods.name: Absorb
armorMods.description: When taking direct damage from skills, has a [6%~30%] chance to restore [1.6%~8%] HP and [6~30] MP. Trigger Interval: 30s

armorMods.name: Aggression
armorMods.description: When gaining a Shield, there is an [8%~40%] chance to increase Basic Attack Critical Rate by [2.5%~12%] for 4 seconds. Cooldown: 30s

armorMods.name: Relentlessness
armorMods.description: When gaining a Shield, [8%~40%] chance to increase Skill Critical Rate by [1.5%~7.5%] for 4s. Cooldown: 30s

armorMods.name: Footwork
armorMods.description: When dodging a Basic Attack, [10%~50%] chance to heal for [1.6%~8%]. Cooldown: 20s

armorMods.name: Roar
armorMods.description: When affected by Hard Control effects (Stun, Fear, Frozen, Knockup, Petrify), has a [8%~40%] chance to cast a Bellow that deals [20%~100%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies and inflicts Fear for 1s. Cooldown: 20s after activation.

armorMods.name: Counter
armorMods.description: When taking direct damage from Basic Attacks, there is a [15%~30%] chance to trigger. If triggered, for the next 5 seconds, any direct damage from Basic Attacks reflects [16%~80%] Magic Damage to the attacker and modifies their Armor by [-4%~-20%] for 4 seconds. Cooldown: 25s

armorMods.name: Muzzle
armorMods.description: When taking direct damage from skills, has a [15%~30%] chance to deal [Damage Rate: [12%~60%]] Magic Damage to all enemy targets within the damage source's range, drain [5~25] MP from affected enemies, and reduce the damage affected enemies deal by [-4%~-20%] for 4 seconds. Trigger Interval: 30s

armorMods.name: Fortune
armorMods.description: When taking damage equal to more than 25% Max HP within 2s, [6%~30%] chance to recover [1.6%~8%] HP and gain Damage Immunity for [0.4%~2%]. Cooldown: 30s

armorMods.name: Resolve
armorMods.description: When affected by Hard Control effects (Stun, Fear, Freeze, Knockup, Petrify, Sleep), [6%~30%] chance to increase Crowd Control Resistance Rate by [1.9%~9.5%] for 4s. Cooldown: 30s

armorMods.name: Intimidate
armorMods.description: When using Chest skills, there is a [12%~60%] chance to deal [Damage Rate: [20%~100%]] Magic Damage to nearby enemies and reduces their Movement Speed by [-6%~-30%] and damage dealt by [-3%~-15%] for 4s. Trigger Interval: 10s

armorMods.name: Charge Up
armorMods.description: When using Chest skills, detonates after 1s to deal [Damage Rate: [26%~130%]] Physical Damage to nearby enemies and reduce their Attack Speed by [-12%~-60%] for 6s. Trigger Interval: 10s

armorMods.name: Pain Relief
armorMods.description: When using Chest skills, restores [1.6%~8.2%] HP and [10~50] MP to nearby allies. Trigger Interval: 10s

armorMods.name: Protection
armorMods.description: When using Boots Skills, the character gains an additional [Target-based Max HP [5%~25%]] Shield Value for 4s. Trigger Interval: 20s

armorMods.name: Deception
armorMods.description: When using Boots skills, throw a trap at your feet; When triggered by an enemy, deal [Damage Rate: [16%~80%]] Physical Damage and stuns them for [0.4~2]s. Trigger Interval: 20s

armorMods.name: Divine Blessing
armorMods.description: When using Boot skills, restores [1.3%~6.5%] HP and becomes immune to control effects for [0.4%~2]s. Cooldown: 20s
